# Moro River campaign order of battle__disambig_1

The Moro River campaign order of battle is a listing of the significant formations that were involved in the fighting during the Moro River campaign in December 1943, part of the Italian Campaign of World War II.
File:Morotank.jpg|Canadian Sherman tank driven off the road by German mortar fire, 10 Dec 1943
File:Moro 48th counterattack.jpg|Riflemen of the 48th Highlanders of Canada take cover during German counterattack north of San Leonardo, 10 Dec 1943
File:Bernard_Law_Montgomery.jpg|Bernard Law Montgomery
File:Joachim_Lemelsen_%281888-1954%29.jpg|Joachim Lemelsen
